code:
sequenceDiagram
    participant Client as Client
    participant DataTrans as data_transmission.c
    participant Acquisition as acquisition.c
    
    Client->>DataTrans: Connect to data socket
    activate DataTrans
    
    Note over DataTrans,Acquisition: External ADC already initialized during startup
    
    alt mode == 0 (IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream)
        loop Until client disconnects
            DataTrans->>Acquisition: Take spi_mutex
            DataTrans->>Acquisition: spi_device_polling_transmit(IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController)
            Acquisition-->>DataTrans: SPI transaction complete
            DataTrans->>Acquisition: Release spi_mutex
            
            DataTrans->>Client: non_blocking_send(IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic) buffer
            
            opt Socket change detected
                DataTrans->>DataTrans: Break acquisition loop
            end
        end
    else mode == 1 (IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker)
        loop Until client disconnects
            DataTrans->>Acquisition: Take spi_mutex
            DataTrans->>Acquisition: spi_device_polling_transmit(IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream)
            Acquisition-->>DataTrans: SPI transaction complete
            DataTrans->>Acquisition: Release spi_mutex
            
            DataTrans->>Acquisition: pcnt_unit_get_count(IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode)
            Acquisition-->>DataTrans: Current counter state
            
            alt Edge detected (IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController)
                DataTrans->>Client: non_blocking_send(IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream) buffer
            end
        end
    end
    
    Client->>DataTrans: Disconnect
    DataTrans->>DataTrans: safe_close(IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController)
    deactivate DataTrans

cscw_dialogue.utterance: 然后，流程会走到 IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream 和 IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController。
明白，所以它是承接上一步的，内容是 'IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream 和 IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController'？
可以，继续吧。
